lenders.name: khadija
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do

lenders.name: Francesca
lenders.loan_because: I have a business and it feel great. So I wanted someone else to get that same feeling.
lenders.occupational_info: I love making people feel beautiful inside and out. It is the best job in the world.

lenders.name: Jacquelyn
lenders.loan_because: Adversity does not build character, it reveals it.  I just want to help and this seems to be the best way.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I am looking for a job but I am not in dire straights; Kiva gives me hope for a better world...

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I had been looking for a way to have my money work for others...
lenders.occupational_info: I sell new homes

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: I started a small business, and I understand the need for capital.

lenders.name: Phil and Kim
lenders.loan_because: We want to help those in need to better themselves and therfore provide a better life for their family.
lenders.occupational_info: Military/Real Estate Financing

lenders.name: Chyrll
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me above all I could ever have imagined through the help of others. I now want to pass on what help I can give to someone who really needs it. This is the gift that keeps on giving, touching not only this present generation, but future generations as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired after many years of being an administrative assistant. Now I take care of my husband and our home. I enjoy Precept Bible Studies. As time permits, I sew clothes for babies and young children. Also I enjoy working in my little flower garden.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: The money is going to help people help themselves

lenders.name: Lindsey
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: It is an incredible opportunity to improve a stranger's life in some small way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist and designer. I use mostly recycled materials like old record albums, recycled paper and salvaged wood. I like to find beauty in things that other people overlook.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: serving human dignity is everyone's responsibility.

lenders.name: Virginia
lenders.loan_because: It's wonderful to feel you've made a direct contribution to helping a real person rather than just give money to some organization and never know if anyone truly benefited.

lenders.name: Karri
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to empower others to support themselves. I have been blessed in my life and feel that I should give back and make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a fundraising company that helps non-profit organizations raise money for their causes.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: my parents are both from Vietnam & I have seen firsthand the power of the wills of some of the world's poorest people.  Many people in 3rd world countries want so badly to make their lives better & would endure any hardship that comes but have no means to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full-time law student and I hope to use my degrees to make a real difference in the world, especially concerning international human rights.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I believe it's important to help others advance their own lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people improve their overall health.

lenders.name: kristen
lenders.occupation: assistant to real estate agent / substitute teach
lenders.loan_because: I want to help!  It's as simple as that!
lenders.occupational_info: I assist a real estate agent in the buying and selling of homes.  I also fill in for teachers at school when they need time off.

lenders.name: Denae
lenders.loan_because: together with other lenders I can help people across the world help themselves

lenders.name: Jaclyn
lenders.loan_because: The sales in my profession have been in a downward slump for some time now.  As of recent, I've noticed that it has been starting to take an emotional toll on me.  I didn't want to sit around and feel sorry for myself!  I thought that maybe if I helped someone in need, it would help me to feel better about my situation.  And it definitely did!
lenders.occupational_info: I sell new homes in the Chicagoland area.

lenders.name: William Young Jr Artisan Chocolatier
lenders.loan_because: We are all one human family and I want to help my brothers and sisters.
lenders.occupational_info: Creating joy one bite at a time.

lenders.name: Gillian
lenders.loan_because: Because I can
lenders.occupational_info: I am a lawyer who works primarily for businesses.

lenders.name: Tanisha
lenders.loan_because: I feel blessed for my opportunities.  I want to help others.

lenders.name: Antoine
lenders.loan_because: I believe in micro credit
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that analyzes specific companies, how they are doing and how they could do better

lenders.name: Levi & Mandy
lenders.loan_because: We have been given beyond our needs and are called to give.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with so much and coming from a 3rd world country I understand the needs of the people who are trying to make a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with sellers and buyers of homes and land, assisting them in fulfilling their real estate needs, wants and desires.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: With Kiva you can really make a difference in somebody's life!

lenders.name: Mavis
lenders.loan_because: it is a more personal way to contribute to the success of small entreprises in developing countries especially those managed by women.
lenders.occupational_info: As an officer of the Canadian International Development Agency (CIDA) I plan and manage development  projects.

lenders.name: Suzon
lenders.loan_because: the world is a small place and each of these people is my neighbor trying to make a bit of it better.
lenders.occupational_info: instrumental in getting new medical devices approved for sale in the global marketplace after ensuring their safety and efficacy.

lenders.name: Phil
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I write software programs.

lenders.name: G,S&g
lenders.loan_because: of the impact it creates in our world - spread the love -
lenders.occupational_info: G - is a chef and director of food service / S - runs the community shared agricultural program and gardens for a non-profit / g - is our 19 year old son who goes to school, plays music and enjoys his life

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I believe in women and know we can do anything we set our minds to do.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: It is important to me to give service to those in need.  I salute those who take the initiative to invest in their own destiny by starting a business. It is very rewarding to see people succeed. As a human being we all have the responsibility to serve, share and help others whenever we are able.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to help families buy and sell homes. It is rewarding to be able to help someone move on to their next adventure in their new home.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to have the desire to suceed but lack the funds to move forward.
lenders.occupational_info: My sister and I have a small embroidery business. We embroider company logos on promotional items. We also make handmade vests, jackets etc. As well we have a contract to sew binding on window valances.

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs to be loved
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Photographer, I take pictures of weddings, parties and people. I also sell art work.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.occupational_info: I am a secretary for a local police department.

lenders.name: Alin
lenders.loan_because: While not rich by any means I am very blessed.
lenders.occupational_info: My occupation pretty much describes itself.

lenders.name: Tera
lenders.loan_because: I believe God wants us to help each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I dispatch State Troopers to calls for help that come in.

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: empowering women by giving them the diginity of changing their situation themselves is much more powerful a gift than pllain charity

lenders.name: Emi
lenders.loan_because: I receive a monthly income so I am able to lend money to people who can use it to better their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: To educate myself and others about the world we all live in and to try to help others who need it.

lenders.name: Amber Kamdar-Sharif
lenders.loan_because:
someone gave me a chance and now I want to give that chance to someone else!
Thank you Oprah!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 6th grade English...

lenders.name: Ambracia
lenders.loan_because: Its my duty as an American to use my blessings to help others.

lenders.name: Courtney
lenders.loan_because: I think everybody deserves a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell new homes.

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.occupational_info: I teach business and computers to students 14-18 years old during the day.  I play music and perform during the evening.

lenders.name: CHERYL
lenders.loan_because: I started my company on a shoestring and admire these people who are willing to work to make a better life for them and people they love.
lenders.occupational_info:
Selling and managing property that makes an income for the owners.
Also write a business column for a newspaper

lenders.name: dana
lenders.loan_because: it is my priviledge and honor to help those who want to help themselves. everyone deserves a chance to thrive. i have worked hard and have been blessed and feel very fortunate to be in a position to lend to others.
lenders.occupational_info: i make ads for major movies

lenders.name: Brandy Kariuki
lenders.loan_because: It is important to to reach out to someone in need and to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: My job and passion is to assist people looking for work.  A good majority of the individuals that I help are low income or from third world countries.  I find joy and satisfaction in helping people find independance and stability.

lenders.name: Floyd & Herti
lenders.loan_because: It's a feel good thing to know that you have helped make positive difference in someone's life style for their family.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: everyone can use a little help.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I hope that it helps improve the quality of life for people
lenders.occupational_info: Employing good people, treating them fairly and with respect all through their lives.

lenders.name: Jeremiah
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy many blessings and I delight in being able to help others live in a world of plenty
lenders.occupational_info: I own several small businesses:  web stores, home service business, Skateboard manufacturer.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: 34. "A new command I give you: Love one another. As I have loved you, so you must love one another. 35. By this all men will know that you are my disciples, if you love one another." John 13:34-35
lenders.occupational_info: I design websites. I am retired law-enforcement and now work from my home. I also have an online gift shop.

lenders.name: Felipe
lenders.occupational_info: I make and fit external braces (leg, spine, arms) and artificial limbs.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: the world is a globe not an empire
lenders.occupational_info: I bring together people who think differently about the same issue and help them find what they have in common

lenders.name: Derek
lenders.loan_because: I have far more than I need.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell homes and property... compared with most people in the world, I don't work at all.

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: even a little bit goes a long way. Numerous people have helped me in my lifetime, now it is my turn to do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a manager of a family owned French bakery and bistro and couldn't love my job more!

lenders.name: Lauren and Family
lenders.loan_because: My family and I feel very strongly about social welfare, both in the United States and abroad.  It is encouraging to see so many people giving so much to people abroad.  We are lucky as Americans to have so much and not even know it.  It is amazing how foregoing a dinner out at a restaurant can help someone thousands of miles away fund an entire business!
lenders.occupational_info: Currently in residency training at UCSD in San Diego, CA and my family and I are enjoying life in southern California.

lenders.name: Gary and Jeff
lenders.loan_because: It's something that my Dad and I do together to help other families.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who are excited to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help inform students and parents about higher education, specifically for the university I work for, the University of St. Thomas

lenders.name: Alejandra
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to give my mom something that she would really like on her birthday.  I also hope to learn the importance of helping others and making this world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: eating, sleeping, growing, learning and making my family very happy.

lenders.name: Dolores
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone realize a dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I.m  retired housewife.  Mother of 5 still dabbling in photography and still in demand to photograph events, church activities, family reunions etc.

lenders.name: Brad & Elaine
lenders.loan_because: We hope that we can help.

lenders.name: Sarah Smile
lenders.loan_because: I feel blessed to have been able to start and grow my business and want to help others do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a home décor designer. See what makes me smile...

lenders.name: Carla
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people grow and succeeed.  I also loan in remembrance of my father, who passed away last year.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the National Special Needs Trust department.  Our department takes care of trust accounts that have been set up for people with special needs.  It is rewarding to work with those that overcome so many challenges on a daily basis.  They are inspirations.

lenders.name: karen
lenders.loan_because: I am a single mom working to support my son. I would like to help other women do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I promote the products my company sells.

lenders.name: Rob & Lynette

lenders.name: Emilia
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should try to extend a helping hand when they can.

lenders.name: Robert

lenders.occupational_info: Always getting our man... :)

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: After watching a show on "Oprah" and seeing what difference this made, I also  wanted to make a difference in someone life
lenders.occupational_info: My work is very Interesting and challenging. To see someone being able to buy their first home is a reward in itself.

lenders.name: Angie
lenders.loan_because: everyone should do it

lenders.name: Robert & Maddy
lenders.loan_because: of the golden rule.

lenders.name: Deb

lenders.occupational_info: I sell high school level books about architecture and drafting.

lenders.occupational_info: I train thoroughbred race horses.

lenders.name: Dianna
lenders.loan_because: Helping others is the greatest personal satisfaction for me.
lenders.occupational_info: Being a mother is the most challenging and rewarding job I'ver ever had. I also am on call for the schools to work with students, which I feel blessed to be able to do.

lenders.name: wanda
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of others, - anything is possible.  Be the change.
lenders.occupational_info: Support women and children in crisis.

lenders.name: david

lenders.name: Elesha & Mike
lenders.loan_because: "Because I have been given much, I too much give" are the lines of one of my favorite hymns.  My husband and I are greatly blessed and Kiva gives us opportunities to help others in need.  After recent visits to South Africa and another planned with our children in 2008, we know how blessed we are and want to help others when possible.
lenders.occupational_info: Mike and I are involved in the selling of products and adminstration of these programs and finances of the business. Mike sells furniture in a retail outlet and I am the VP of a Equipment Manufacturing Company.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I lend because I would want someone to lend to me if I needed it.  I think many honest people are taken advantage of by other people and I want to try to help someone do what they can do to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to write screenplays that producers will like and buy from me so that they can make them into feature-length films.

lenders.name: Milt & Betty
lenders.loan_because: I'ts the right thing to do when we are so blessed.
lenders.occupational_info: Everyone has their duty to do their part, no matter how smalll

lenders.name: Randy
lenders.loan_because: To help along the entrepreneurial spirit of people who are obviously trying to better their situation, but sometimes do not have the same opportunities to fulfill that spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: Steel fence construction. Welding and fabrication

lenders.name: Erika Villegas
lenders.loan_because: i know that many of these people need this one opportunity to make a difference in their life and their families.

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: Being an entrepreneur for many years, I realize the balance between hard work, dedication and inspired ideas along with the need for capital.  I'd like to be in a position to help those where capital is non-existent, especially the women.
lenders.occupational_info: I promote travel to Tanzania through luxury safari vacations, which support the local economy and help foster an appreciation for Africa's wildlife.

lenders.name: Lynne
lenders.loan_because: I want to take advantage of the sustainable and affordable opportunities we have to connect with and help each other globally
lenders.occupational_info: Apart from going to school, I give city tours of Ottawa as a guide on a double decker bus.

lenders.name: chantal
lenders.loan_because: when i needed someone to help me, i had friends who readed out and without them i wouldn't be where i am today. so all i want to to do is help others to reach for their dreams when they need it most.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies build web sites, mostly large newspaper and tv media companies.

lenders.name: Christie and Steve
lenders.loan_because: We both love the idea of helping other people around the world achieving a loan so that they can help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info:
Christie is a Speech Therapist who helps mostly elderly people re-learn to talk, eat, and think more clearly after they've had some medical problems.

Steve is a dispatcher for the trucking industry to move shipments around North America smoothly.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because:
helping a woman improves her, her family,
her town, region, country and the world.

We are in this together; each of us should give help, no matter how small it seems.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I want to increase access to the equity to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: Just trying to make a small impact.

lenders.name: dona
lenders.loan_because: i believe one step at a time can change the world

lenders.name: Mellony
lenders.loan_because: I like to make others happy and I like to help people make their dreams come true. If I had more I would give more.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for Crosby County in the Courthouse. I pay the county bills and do the payroll for several employees. I also help the auditor with the county budget. I work 40 hours a week at the courthouse, and spend the rest of my time at home with my husband, or doing things for my grandkids. My husband is David. He is a police officer. I have five children that are grown, and six grandchildren. We have two dogs for pets. Their names are Bosley and Kylie.

lenders.name: Eleanor
lenders.loan_because: I can't think of anything better to do than to help people who are trying to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a research scientist and I work on Mycobacterium tuberculosis.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to

lenders.name: Lyn
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.occupational_info: I don't work yet.  I am in the 5th grade at school.  But I do get good grades .

lenders.name: Andy

lenders.occupational_info: help organizations and businesses run more efficiently and effectively

lenders.name: Reginald
lenders.loan_because: because it feels good. There is no better feeling than helping someone harness their desires
lenders.occupational_info: I assist persons on acquiring homes, starting businesses, taking trips and just starting over in life. I try to bring smiles to people faces.

lenders.name: Krista
lenders.loan_because: It's a way to change the world one random act of kindness at a time. I can afford to help and so I will do whatever I can to help those less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mother of two. My husband is active duty U.S. Air Force.

lenders.name: pat
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed.  It is a selfish act that makes me feel good.

lenders.name: Lynnea
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to be able to help. I cant wait to see the businesses grow and I will be cheering them on from my computer.
lenders.occupational_info: I arrange loans and sell insurance products from a car dealership.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: This is a good thing to do...it feels great to give.

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: I love putting my money to use where it is most effective, and where I can see it working.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: It is money that I won't miss but will change the very life of another person.  That person will impact the lives of their family who will inturn impact their community.  It's amazing to think of the ripple effect a Kiva microloan will have.
lenders.occupational_info: I help non-profits accept electronic forms of payment.

lenders.name: Agustin
lenders.loan_because: I like to help others.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: I have been very blessed and want to enable someone else to better their own life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a tourism bureau, promoting our destination to visitors.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I have always been taught to give.   I think this is an excellent opportunity to give to people around the world to help better their situation in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my husband and son and our home.

lenders.name: Jaden and Beckett
lenders.loan_because: We all need to do what we can to make the world a better place for all.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I own and run a small Inn and restaurant

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: I have the means and the desire to help people who are deserving. I love the concept of allowing someone to provide for themselves or their family with a small donation. I hope the money that I loan to these people will enable them to someday help someone else who is in need.

lenders.name: Carmen
lenders.loan_because: I am very blessed to be able to do so.

lenders.name: Tre` & Dave
lenders.loan_because: We live a very blessed life and are so thankful for that. Therefore, we want to lend a hand to those less fortunate.

lenders.name: Jenifer
lenders.loan_because: I want to change the world...this is how I can help now.
lenders.occupational_info: 15+ years of experience in communications through community and public relations, branding strategies, and social media & technology.

lenders.name: Elaine
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a life and that lending helps both the giver and receiver and helps create a world commuinity.
lenders.occupational_info: I help  inviduals and organizations develop in order to be healthier. I manage many conflicts.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: We are not put on this earth merely to take care of ourselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping customers keep their computer networks secure from outside intruders.

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I stay at home and take care of my daughter and our home.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I  have a small art business - "peace by piece" - I design and create stained glass windows. Half of my proceeds are pledged to peaceful efforts. Promoting stable families helps to promote stable communities and supports peace in the area.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an elementary school teacher - 5th grade - teaching language arts and fine arts. I try to model peaceful efforts for my students, in hopes that they will join in these efforts.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I'm committed to helping another person create a better life for themselves and their community around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm seek ways that assist people trying to find ways to help themselves for a better life.

lenders.name: carol
lenders.loan_because: I know how difficult it is to operate a small business so if I can reach across the world to help in some small way then I do !
lenders.occupational_info: craft person. I make ribbon flowers by hand to sell at craft fairs and shops(very small business)

lenders.name: Jodi
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy to know that doing something this small can make a huge difference.  Without a loan, my husband and I would have never been able to start our business and it gives me great joy to know that we can do that for someone else.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: It is a fabulous way to give a leg up to someone who is in need.

lenders.name: Dawn Suiter
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it can be to get started with a small business.  I also know it can be done with even small amounts of money.  I want to help pay it forward and give others the opportunity to make their world a better place.

lenders.name: Joyce
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do and the least I can do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an accountant for a software firm in the US.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: We are in this world to serve others.
lenders.occupational_info: Marketing Manager for my family's manufacturing company

lenders.name: Adrian
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student working to become a counselor.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Giving people a hand up is simply the right thing to do and it's very rewarding!
lenders.occupational_info: As a Realtor, I help people in Las Vegas, Nevada ,USA to buy and sell homes.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: To give a hand up to people less lucky than me.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell test preparation software to schools and school systems.

lenders.name: Margo
lenders.loan_because: I believe we should all help each other. I believe this is God's plan for each and everyone of us, reach out and give to one another.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I want to promote growth which is  sustainable economically, socially and environmentally and Kiva's bottom up approach allows this to be done easily, collaboratively and effectively.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Internet connectivity strategist and learning network consultant.

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: I feel is our duty to help our fellow man in need.  This website provides an amazing opportunity to do so.

lenders.name: kasey
lenders.loan_because: A little can do a lot!!!

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me in my life. I appreciate this opportunity to share these blessings with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Lutheran pastor. I lead a congregation in Illinois, and I spend my days planning programs, preparing worship services, teaching and visiting members of my church.

lenders.name: Kenn
lenders.occupation: Electrical, Plumbing, HV AC, CIS and also CWC

lenders.name: Chris Moerles
lenders.loan_because: Because it's so simple to do, and the money comes back to me to help others.

lenders.name: Nneka
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed enough to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I deal with the ethics problems in a hospital.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: It takes a village!
lenders.occupational_info: I listen to people and try to help them figure out solutions to their worries.

lenders.name: Spencer
lenders.occupational_info: medical research for neurological diseases

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I've been so blessed to be able to open my own business in the USA and earn a good living for myself.  I've been looking for a small way to  bring that good fortune to someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for drug companies who are trying to make new medicines. I travel to different doctors' offices and make sure they are keeping the people who try these new medicines safe.

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others achieve a better life through helping them help themselves

lenders.name: Theia
lenders.loan_because: As a single mother of 3 teen-aged sons, God has blessed and allowed me to provide a comfortable lifestyle for the four of us. I am probably one paycheck away from poverty myself but it is due to my own fault and carelessness. I waste plenty of my money on frivolous things and have always wanted to make a difference where it was needed the most and would be appreciated. With the minimum of $25.00 a real difference and change for others across the world is possible.  When I saw Kiva on Oprah I knew this was IT!  A perfect way to give back. I knew that I didn't have millions like Bill Clinton, Agassi, nor Oprah, however, $25.00 now and a little more later, yes! It is our purpose in life to help one another to make this world a better place for all. I thank God, Oprah, and Kiva for the opportunity to do my part world-wide!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital setting on an orthopaedic surgical unit. I am an integral part of helping patients regain their physical strength, mobility, and pain management. Normally, the days are 12-16 hours long. Most days it is mentally and physically challenging due to the racism and prejudices that face America. Other days it rewarding to see the smiles and gratitude of the patients / family member's lives myself and my co-workers have touched by restoring optimal health and a safe return home for them regardless of the obstacles faced.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help facilitate success.
lenders.occupational_info: I am living abroad with my husband and helping keep things organized in our home. I also do volunteer work in the community and love to travel.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: To give someone a chance to improve their life.
lenders.occupational_info: I create artwork for businesses, the artwork helps them to sell their product.

lenders.name: Terri
lenders.loan_because: I believe showing faith in humanity raises us all up.
lenders.occupational_info: I am dedicated to helping women and their families have healthy and beautiful birth experiences.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: I firmly believe that where there is prosperity, there is peace.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage rental homes and properties.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes good people need a little help to get started, so why not? I have spent far more on FAR less.
lenders.occupational_info: I own and operate a facitlity that boards dogs/catsand small pets while their owners are away

lenders.name: sue
lenders.loan_because: Give a man a fish and he eats for a day, teach a man to fish and he eats for a lifetime.

lenders.name: brittany
lenders.loan_because: i can!

lenders.name: jjstar
lenders.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mother to our son...enjoying spending time watching him grow into a Christ following man.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is the most effective way of making the world a better place, one loan at a time.

lenders.name: Diann
lenders.loan_because: I love to help others in need.

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: I'd hope that if I was in the same situation, someone would do the same for me.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to struggle to support yourself.  I am glad to help those less fortunate and wish I could do more.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is very rewarding.  I utilize my talent for color and style to assist people in selecting furniture for their homes.

lenders.name: Carina
lenders.loan_because: If we are fortunate enough to be able to, we should.

lenders.name: Hugues
lenders.loan_because:
I can, and because everyone deserves a chance to have a decent life. 
Unlike our so called developped countries were credit has become abusive, loans on Kiva seem to serve a real and beneficial purpose.

lenders.name: Courtney
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to have someone believe in you and a cause.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the president of a company that deals in oil, real estate, andengine patents.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: of the Golden Rule.

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because:
I have struggled to raise myself out of poverty. It was the help of other people that made it possible for me. I believe we are all in this together.
I spent most of my life farming; I recently grduated from college with a degree in science education. I would have stayed with farming if I could have made a living so I will primarily loan to farmers. As a single mother I will also show preference for single Parents world wide.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach science and art to high school students.

lenders.name: Carlos
lenders.whereabouts: Porto Alegre Rio Grande do Sul

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because:
My reason for getting involved in Kiva is best described with the following quote:
"Do not wait for leaders; do it alone, person to person."
                                 -Mother Teresa

lenders.name: Jean
lenders.loan_because: I want to do good in the world and this is a sure way to help someone in need.  Former President Bill Clinton talked about Kiva on the Oprah show. This is a legit business.

lenders.name: Beth & Paul
lenders.loan_because: We like to help people who are trying to better their lives and the lives of their families.

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.occupation: mother, fabric artist and oh so much more
lenders.loan_because: I think the idea of reaching out a hand to help around the world is a wonderful thing.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother and I sew blankets that are also pieces of art

lenders.name: Jena
lenders.loan_because: I want to teach my children that the world is a huge place but they can still make a difference.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I want to give others a chance to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: All types of planning for,  Parks and Open Space, Land Development, City Master Plans and others.

lenders.name: Lorraine
lenders.loan_because: I'm grateful for what I have and see the desparate need of others.The same need my father had in 1911, when he came from Italy to the U.S
lenders.occupational_info: retired senior lady. I do my own gardening and vegetable planting. Also volunteer work at our Italian social club.

lenders.name: Summer
lenders.occupation: Mother of three boys under four!

lenders.name: Carlos
lenders.loan_because: I truly believe in the "The Golden Rule" a fundamental moral principle found in virtually all major religions and cultures, which simply means "treat others as you would like to be treated." It is arguably the most essential basis for the modern concept of human rights. Help individuals with the tools required to succeed and they will !
lenders.occupational_info: Retired after serving my country for 21 years with HONOR, DIGNITY and PRIDE .

lenders.name: woode
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good.....
lenders.occupational_info: i spread love.....

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: Through Kiva, I can help people and feel like I am having a direct impact on their lives.  And it simply makes me feel good to help!

lenders.name: TERI & EDEN
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is the Lord 's will for us  to give and to help others and  I want to help make a difference in someone's  life.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: What a neat thing to get to be a part of.  I've needed a loan before, it helped.  It's a gift to get to help someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I write for television shows, I also perform comedy by myself and with groups.

lenders.name: Micheryl
lenders.loan_because: This is my way of giving back.
lenders.occupational_info: I have an online eBay store.

lenders.name: Marjorie
lenders.loan_because: Its important to me to be part of the solution.

lenders.name: Roxanne
lenders.occupation: Registered Nurse, Critical Care Education Speciali

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I believe we are all on this lifeboat we call Earth, together.  If we do not work together and help each other, we will never make any progress.
lenders.occupational_info: Since retiring I've become a certified Master Naturalist and spend volunteer time helping with environmental projects.

lenders.name: DE&DE
lenders.loan_because: We believe in the power of microfinance to make a positive impact in the lives of deserving recipients.

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: What a wonderful way to give!  As little as $25 can make an impact on someone's life!  Give because you can!

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: God has Blessed me and it is my honor to be a Blessing to others.

lenders.name: Mendy & Stuart
lenders.loan_because: We are the sum total of our past but we are not held captive to it.

lenders.name: Monique
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people!

lenders.name: Sherry
lenders.loan_because: I think we can all make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I own and operate a very small ladies gym.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: We all need help sometimes . . . if we each helped each other we'd live in a perfect world . . . I'm far from perfect but I'm working at it! I'm grateful for the opprotunity to help. Thank you.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Invasive Cardiology managing the operating rooms that do Cardiac Catheterization. We use X-rays to see inside the heart and internal catheters to see the heart from the inside. We fix broken hearts!

lenders.name: Laurel & family
lenders.loan_because: If I can be of help to someone who needs it, how can I not help.

lenders.name: Teresa
lenders.loan_because: I used to be poor, but I'm not anymore!
lenders.occupational_info: I design and sell logo jewelry for Big Brothers Big Sisters of America....a wonderful not-for-profit organization.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I want others to have a better life.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I think this is the right way to help out people in need: with respect.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the translation field.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: To help alleviate poverty, to empower someone to better their life and living conditions, and because I am grateful and thankful for what I have and am fortunate to be in a position to share,...even if only a little.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach art history at a large university in the United States. I teach my students that all art is an expression and reflection of the culture that made it, and to approach all art with an attitude of respect.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: Because We Must

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: it is the least I can do to help a hard worker.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Because I support entrepreneurship throughout the world, and I believe one of the best ways to end poverty is to help those in need with the tools to better their own situations. Kiva puts the power into the hands of the people, not the government.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an attorney practicing in Intellectual Property Law and Business Law.

lenders.name: Don and Diane
lenders.loan_because: We want to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: retired State of California employees

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.loan_because: I am able to pay my bills and I want to share what's left.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in the crystal wine glass business. We custom decorate glasses, bottles and decanters.

lenders.name: Priscilla
lenders.loan_because:
"You must be the change you want to see in the world."
---Ghandi

lenders.name: Sonia, Darrell & Austin
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed us and our family.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I know it is the best way to help people.  I want to help them build onto their own lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell businesses to people who want to be in business for themselves.

lenders.name: Ruwani
lenders.loan_because: These small business entrepreneurs are trying to improve their lot in life with hard work and dedication. Even with a small amount of money I can make a difference.  I am glad to be able to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people finance their homes.  If they want to purchase a property, I find the money (from banks) to lend to them.  If they want to change their current loan on their property, I find better financing for them.

lenders.name: Bobbie and Jim
lenders.loan_because:
We have lived in third world 
  countries, know the need and
  support free enterprise.
lenders.occupational_info:
We are retired, but still are very
   active and love to travel.  Love to
    meet and be of help when and
    where we can.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: Want to help less fortunate
lenders.occupational_info: I work at an airport

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: We are all one family.

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: Giving is one of the most important things we can do on this earth for others. It is such a joy watching people's dreams come true.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I loan because from the success of the small business, the seeds of economic and governmental stability will grow. I wish I could do more.
lenders.occupational_info: I make craft beer.

lenders.name: Kosta & Wiebke
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to better themselves.

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: I worry about women's rights and survival around the world and want all to know that Americans do care.
lenders.occupational_info: I spent 45 years of my life educating children of all ages to respect themselves and others and guiding them toward becoming productive and caring citizens of the world.

lenders.name: DAWN
lenders.loan_because: it will make a difference to peoples lives

lenders.name: Laurie & Braeden
lenders.loan_because: Just "paying it forward"...

lenders.name: anthony
lenders.loan_because: I believe that giving someone a small amt of money and if they have the desire and follow through  to operate a business they will succeed.  Just as I did.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked with persons with special needs assisting them to become as independent and capable individuals as possible.

lenders.name: Katelin
lenders.loan_because: I like the people and their stories.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school.

lenders.name: nancy & mike
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: It is a good way to remember that we are all part of one world community.

lenders.name: Aisha
lenders.loan_because: in order to make a difference it's starts with you

lenders.name: Stevens Family
lenders.loan_because: We believe in the universal law of reciprication... what you send out into the universe comes back to you. And to whom much is given much is expected.
lenders.occupational_info: We sell, install and maintain wood athletic flooring (basketball courts/gym floors)

lenders.name: Marianna
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info:
I fundraise for my alma mater, Loyola Marymount University.
Go Lions!

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my success and good fortune with others that are less fortunate and need a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I help large banks and telecommunication companies with their business systems.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I want to see other Mom's in the world succeed in raising their children the best way they can.  With help they can give their  children the ability to be in school and have a better life for the future. This makes me feel good inside to be able to help like this in this big world that we all share!!!  :)
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired now from raising my family. My son Michael is 32 and daughter Amy is 29. They are through college and have great jobs. My husband is retired too from being an airline pilot for years. We live in Carlsbad California and have been married for 34 years.  I sold real estate after my children grew up and went off to college and just retired now. My husband and I want to help other Mom's raise their children in far away countries and help them to go to school so their future can be successful in every way possible.  I think all mothers and fathers want this for their children no matter where they live and what their circumstances are.  I am happy to be able to help !!!   :)   Keep Smiling !!!!  :)

lenders.name: Margot & Gustavo
lenders.loan_because: I really want to encourage people to follow their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info:
I help people to plan financially for when their loved ones die and they are left in debt.
On the side, when I have time, I use clay to throw or sculpt art forms.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: My class has been learning about people in need and I saw the Oprah Show and thought it would be a good idea to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I don't work yet i'm just a 5th grader

lenders.name: Dianne
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with a good life. I want to be able to share and help others in any way that I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 6 year old children in an elementary school.

lenders.name: Baynesey.
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Married to an awesome Ecuadorian man we have an amazing daughter, live and work in NYC.

lenders.name: natalie
lenders.loan_because: I believe in self reliance, and helping the poor.

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others and at the same time educate my 5 year old boys on what life is like for people in other countries.
lenders.occupational_info: Selling Schlafly Beer to various businesses and through promotions and tastings.

lenders.name: Antonette and Rigo
lenders.loan_because: We appreciate how just a little help can be a huge boost.  We get enormous satisfaction from assisting others in our own very small way.  Their individual success is ours as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell network services like internet connections to businesses.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: It helps to retain the dignity of an individual.  Those who are given a helping hand will generally do the same in return.
lenders.occupational_info: Retirement affords the luxury of volunteering my services.

lenders.name: Vince, Deb and 11 paws
lenders.loan_because: Because everyone deserves a helping hand.

lenders.name: Joyce
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance!

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people do the work that they want to do and to help their families have more secure lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired teacher with a great love for my childen and grand and great grandchildren, and want to help other people enjoy their lives and be safe.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: I admire the determination of people to suceed.
lenders.occupational_info: I hand paint old furniture giving it new life

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: It's such an easy way to give back.  I like making a difference for someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a medical case management company in Indianapolis.  We coordinate medical care for injured workers and employees who are undergoing surgical procedures.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help someone who is willing to do something to help them self.
lenders.occupational_info: i am presently in school to be a nurse. i hope when i graduate i will be able to also give of my service as a nurse to help people in need.

lenders.name: Mark CDT
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful way  to help others who don't have the same fortunate circumstances as us.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a member of the Kiva Lending Team - Crazy Canucks.

Please join us !!!

lenders.name: leonida
lenders.loan_because: I want to assist others in their ventures and growth
lenders.occupational_info: export cars, equipment to 3rd countries

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: I'm blessed in so many ways and want to give back some of what I've received

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: To help change someone's life for what I might pay for a tank of gas in the US?  It's a blessing that KIVA exists and it's a blessing to participate.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a large retail staff for a local bank.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I think when you give to others  you get back so much more in return.  :-)

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: Helping others helps everyone.  Plus, I like to see people succeed and find joy in their lives.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: I think this is an awesome opportunity to help make a direct difference in someone's life. I don't have much but this is an opportunity for me to do something for others on this planet.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a web designer.  I do whatever I can to help the people in my town.

lenders.name: Robert Day & AJ Northrop
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we want to make a difference in the world. We discovered KIVA when watching Oprah and decided that this was an option worth exploring. The fact that we can make affordable loans and donations to those who will benefit from it in a way that will not only assist them in supporting themselves and their families but maybe even have a lasting impact on an entire community and way of life. And do it with what we consider a very small investment.
lenders.occupational_info: One of us works for a High End Tradtional Mens and Womens Clothing Company (almost 200 years old) and the other works for the Premier Coffee Purveyor and Roaster in America.

lenders.name: Cathy & Russell
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we can!  It is great to be in a position that we can help others.
lenders.occupational_info:
Cathy - nursing educator
Russell - teacher
We both try to make the world a better place by helping learners to help others.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I have plenty to sustain my life and wish to help others pursue their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I help hospitals in Tennessee provide better patient care by performing process improvements.

lenders.name: diane
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people who are working  to help themselves

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because: I do this for a selfish reason--it makes me feel "good" to know I have helped someone.
lenders.occupational_info: Before retirement, I taught children in high school.

lenders.name: dawn
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother of a special-needs child, and am lucky that I CAN stay home with her.

lenders.name: Brenna
lenders.loan_because: I know how good I have it and I know that I need to give back.

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: I love seeing the power of coming together to make something happen, and feeling like a philanthropist for $25...

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: Together we can make a difference.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: we each have a responsibility to make this a better world and help others in need.

lenders.name: Zoe
lenders.loan_because: I think it is important to give everyone a hand up instead of a hand out.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to make a safe and environmentally friendly work site protecting everyone who works in our manufacturing plant

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: i want to help people that want to help themselves. if i have some extra money why not help others that need it for something that will help themselves and their families
lenders.occupational_info: i work in an office on a university. i am a secretary in a way...but with many more responsibilities than your average secretary,

lenders.name: Nina
lenders.loan_because: I come from a third world country (El Salvador) and grew up poor.  The sacrifice my parents made coming to the United States provided an incredible opportunity such as a college education to succeed.  I want to give back a little of what has been given to me.  Kiva allows me to lend a "hand" to those who are still struggling.
lenders.occupational_info: I market wireless products (cell phones)  for the Hispanic market in Arizona and New Mexico.  My work involves advertising, community involvement, merchandising and reporting.

lenders.name: Brianne
lenders.loan_because: There are seasons in human affairs, when new depths seem to be broken up in the soul, when new wants are unfolded in multitudes and a new and undefined good is thristed for.  There are periods when to dare is the highest wisdom!
lenders.occupational_info: Study, study, study, sleep!!!! Study, study, study, study, sleep!!!!

lenders.name: Kenna
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference somehow.  I love having the chance to help people all over the world, over and over again!

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I like to know that I am helping somebody else achieve their dream.  We are very lucky to be born in the U.S. and many people take that "luck" for granted.  I think it should be appreciated and shared with others because we are no more deserving of it than anybody else.
lenders.occupational_info: I review plans for new buildings and determine the cost to build them.  I also look for errors and make sure what is drawn on the plans can actually be built.

lenders.name: BECAUSE OF JESUS
lenders.loan_because: of Jesus Christ and my strong desire to love and serve Him.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is where ever Jesus leads me to serve Him.

lenders.name: Kathy Jo
lenders.loan_because: I hope to make a difference, I believe that if we all share positive energy we can change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently I am an interior designer but, my true passion is to be a shoe designer like Manolo Blahnik. I hope to one day use my success to make an even larger contribution to the causes that are dear to me.

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: I am in a financial position to help others and giving is the best gift I give to myself, I also rescue dogs which is very rewarding as well as helping others in less fortunate situations. I feel very connected when I can help someone or a dog get the start to a better life.

lenders.name: Wesley
lenders.loan_because: Helping people feels good.  This is an idea whose time has come.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: I realize and understand that there are so many good people in the world who, due to circumstances beyond their control have not been able to enjoy the blessings I enjoy on a daily and ongoing basis. I would be so honored to help someone in their endeavors to better the lifes of themselves, their families and their communities. I know that anyone of us could be placed in the circumstances that other people find themselves in at anytime and would hope that someone would be available to extend help if needed.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse who works in a busy department of a local hospital.

lenders.name: lucy
lenders.loan_because:
AFTER WATCHING Oprah Winfrey'S SHOW I JUST FELT IN MY HEART THAT I HAD TO MAKE A 
DIFFERENCE IN SOMEONE'S LIFE. 
So Here I am . All my life it has  been very easy for me to help someone in need . It is such a rewarding feeling I highly recommend it !! 
I feel so blessed to be a part of helping someone make a 
difference in their life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a Municipal court.

lenders.name: Kristine
lenders.loan_because: I want to help to make this world a better place for people in a less fortunately position than myself.
lenders.occupational_info: Being a Mom is Job #1.  I also do a lot of volunteer work - PAC, District PAC, and a not-for-profit parent education organization that I am the chair of.

lenders.name: Heidi and Tom
lenders.occupational_info: Heidi helps plan changes and expansions to highways. Tom is a biological oceanographer helping companies plan construction projects that avoid impacts to shorelines and wetlands.

lenders.name: Margo
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I need to be part of the change I want to see in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage property for those who have many advantages and options.  But I am always aware that there are those whose options and advantages are limited.

lenders.name: Jerry & Linda
lenders.loan_because: we have been blessed in our lives and want to share in some small way with others who have not been as fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: We are both retired - I was in the insurance business and Linda managed a large customer call center.

lenders.name: Justin & Kirk
lenders.loan_because: We enjoy helping people who are trying to make their lives better.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: This lady is trying her best to make a difference in her life.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired Registered Nurse

lenders.name: Kitti
lenders.loan_because: Paying it forward - someone helped me get started many years ago.
lenders.occupational_info: Courthouse records research to determine ownership of property, then pay owners for leasing property for petroleum exploration.

lenders.name: Kimberley
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to give and those that struggle the most deserve a chance at making their lives better. I am happy and grateful to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell newly constructed homes to people in Houston, Texas

lenders.name: Chris and Lea Wilson
lenders.loan_because: Micro lending gives people an opportunity to pull themselves and their families out of poverty.

lenders.name: Ilana
lenders.loan_because: I believe in this.

lenders.name: EDWARD
lenders.loan_because:
I AM IN NEED OF NOTHING. I HOPE SOME DAY WE CAN ALL SAY THAT! I ALSO WANT OTHERS IN THE WORLD TO KNOW AMERICANS ARE KIND AND LOVING PEOPLE. IT SEEMS WE'VE GOTTEN A BAD RAP OVER THE PAST FEW YEARS.
IT'S PLAIN AND SIMPLY JUST THE RIGHT THING TO DO!
lenders.occupational_info: I CARE FOR MY 86 YEAR OLD MOTHER  WHO LIVES WITH MY PARTNER AND I. SHE NEEDS 24 HOUR A DAY SUPERVISION AND ASSISTANCE. SHE NOW SUFFERS FROM PROGRSSIVE DEMENTIA.. KIVA HELPS ME KEEP A BROADER FOCUS THAN MY LITTLE SPOT ON THE PLANET

lenders.name: Jose
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those that want to do something with their lives.

lenders.name: Birgit
lenders.loan_because: It's fun and it feels good. Besides a small amount of money can make a big difference in someone else's life. So why not?

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: I admire and envy anyone with the energy to open their own business and work hard to make it go!

lenders.name: Tina
lenders.loan_because: This is what our world needs more of,  people who care enough to reach out to help with the success in the lives of others.   How awesome is this!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a family owned transport company.  I work in an office and my job consists of a variety of responsibilities to keep me motivated and busy.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I saw this on the Oprah show and think it's great. I think that we here in the US take so much for granted. I think it's great to help these people achieve their goals & dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I am lucky to to be able to stay home with my 2 young children. I think being home is actually harder work than actually having a "real" job.

lenders.name: Ted
lenders.loan_because: My turn.

lenders.name: Auteema
lenders.loan_because: Beacuse I'm blessed and I live by the motto: I have it worst than some, but better than most.  So why not help someone, even someone that I don't know, reach their goals.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is an amazing program.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student who leads a couple Human Rights groups

lenders.name: Donn
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back some of what I have been fortunate enough to receive.
lenders.occupational_info: I lend money to people who want to buy a home. I also do wildlife rehabilitation to injured or orphaned wildlife.

lenders.name: Cole
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach in schools when the main teacher is absent because of sickness or vacation.

lenders.name: KebehAkwafo
lenders.loan_because: This loan is in the name of Ms. Kebeh Akwafo who departed us in 2007. So, that when her children come of age they can use this money to better their futures.
lenders.occupational_info: Looking Down on my Children, Family and Friends.

lenders.name: ann
lenders.loan_because: my daughter Patricia Austin alerted me to this wonderful site
lenders.occupational_info: arts writer and performance art critic

lenders.name: Teresa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help. I get student loans to attend school. Just wanted to help someone else get a step forward. The picture is my calf Ginger Snap when she was 3 months old.
lenders.occupational_info: I am going to college to become a nurse. I have 3 more semesters to go.

lenders.name: Leah
lenders.loan_because: it's a simple, powerful way to provide opportunities for people who deserve a chance to make a better life for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I do research about health policies in the US and other countries.
